    Make gene manhattan plot

    gene_manhattan_plot.Rd

    Make gene manhattan plot

    gene_manhattan_plot(
  gene.pip.res,
  chr = "chr",
  pos = "pos",
  gene_name = "gene_name",
  gene_pip = "gene_pip",
  sig.pip = 0.8,
  highlight = TRUE,
  ylim = 1.25,
  point.size = 2,
  label.size = point.size * 2,
  font.size = 15,
  max.overlaps = 10,
  title = ""
)

    Arguments

    gene.pip.res

    Gene level finemapping result

    chr

    Name of the chr column in the gene finemapping summary statistics data

    pos

    Name of the pos column in the gene finemapping summary statistics data

    gene_name

    Name of the gene name column in the gene finemapping summary statistics data

    gene_pip

    Name of the gene PIP column in the gene finemapping summary statistics data

    sig.pip

    Signficant gene PIP (default: 0.8)

    highlight

    Highlight genes with gene PIP > sig.pip

    ylim

    Truncate gene PIP to ylim value in the plot (default: 1.25).

    point.size

    Size of the points.

    label.size

    Size of the labels.

    font.size

    Font size of the text.

    max.overlaps

    Exclude text labels that overlap too many things (default: 10).

    title

    Title of the plot

    Contents
